properties.areaDesc: S of Currituck Beach Light NC to Oregon Inlet NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 10 at 2:09PM EST until January 13 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...GUSTY WINDS AND BUILDING SEAS THIS WEEKEND...

.Seas will gradually build tonight as southeasterly flow
increases. Southerly winds will increase to 15 to 25 knots
Saturday with seas building to 5 to 8 feet. A period of gale
force winds in gusts will be possible as winds peak Saturday
night into early Sunday. Winds will gradually diminish late Sunday
and Sunday night, but elevated seas will linger across the waters
into early next week.

* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 5 to 8 feet expected.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Duck to Oregon Inlet.

* WHEN...From 9 AM Saturday to 10 PM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM SATURDAY TO 10 PM EST MONDAY
